title.rendered: (31) Three Dimensional Geologic Modeling System based on FOSS4G products

content.rendered:
Topic:Three Dimensional Geologic Modeling System based on FOSS4G products

Presenter: Shinji MASUMOTO

Type: Oral

Geologic information is one of the important spatio-temporal information for supporting our life. Three dimensional geologic models expressed the geologic distribution of three dimensional subsurface space are essential information in the geologic information. The purpose of the present study is the development of the three dimensional geologic modeling system on Web-GIS for sharing, integrating, processing, and providing geologic information. The base system is constructed by the integration of Web-GIS Engine, GIS and relational database using the typical Free and Open Source Software for Geospatial (FOSS4G) products.
